To invite someone to play, give this URL: Gus cuireadh a thoirt do chuideigin, thoir an url seo dha
Play with the same opponent again: Cluich an aghaidh an aon nàmhaid a-rithist

Tha an cluicheadair eile air a' gheama fhàgail. Is urrainn dhut gèilleadh a chur air, geama ionnannach a ghairm, no feitheamh air a shon.

The first person to come to this URL wil: Cluichidh a’ chiad neach a thig a-steach air an url seo còmhla riut.
White creates the game: Tha geal a’ cruthachadh a’ gheama
Black creates the game: Tha dubh a’ cruthachadh a’ gheama
Share this URL to let spectators see the: Co-roinn an url seo gus luchd-amhairc a leigeil a-steach dhan gheama

Current games: Geamannan a tha ’gan cluich an-dràsta fhèin
You need an account to do that: Tha feum agad air cunntas gus sin a dhèanamh
Computers and computer-assisted players: Computers and computer-assisted players are not allowed to play. Please do not get assistance from chess engines, databases, or from other players while playing. Also note that making multiple accounts is strongly discouraged and excessive multi-accounting will lead to being banned.
All you need is a user name and a passwo: Cha bhi feum agad ach air far-ainm ’s facal-faire

Rematch offer accepted: Ghabhadh ri do thairgse airson ath-mhaids

Bookmark this game: Cruthaich comharra-lìn airson a’ gheama seo.
Free online Chess game. Play Chess now i: Tàileasg air loidhne an-asgaidh. Cluich tàileasg ann am prògram air a bheil dreach glan. Gun chlàradh, gun sanasachd, gun fheum air plugan. Cluich tàileasg an aghaidh a’ choimpiutair, charaidean no nàimhdean air thuaiream.
Free for all: Faodaidh duine sam bith pàirt a ghabhail ann
